lead_paragraph: Forward Chris Simon, who is still serving an N.H.L.-record 25-game suspension for hitting the Rangers’ Ryan Hollweg with a stick last season, re-signed with the Islanders. Simon agreed to a one-year deal worth $475,000.Simon, 35, missed the final 15 regular-season games and all 5 games of the Islanders’ first-round playoff loss to Buffalo. The last five games of his suspension carry to next season. He had 10 goals and 17 assists in 67 games last season.
